document_data.name: Vian-chi
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Vian-chi''' was a secret rebel army commanded by Baron [[Mukow Jian]] of [[Pim Tung]] in [[Tabot]] by {{YearlinkConvert|2607|SY}}.

Mukow's wife, Lady [[Holang]] disguised herself as a man and joined the Vian-chi, and trained to fight as a [[ninja]].
